message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but I think your initial price is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value this product offers is significant.  I could come down to $14,000.  This is my best offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
